text: Marjolein Merkx (born 13 September 1992) is a Dutch softball player from Rosmalen.Profile at dutchsoftballteam.com She became with her club Roef! Dutch national champion in 2019. She is member of the Netherlands women's national softball team. She competed at the 2018 World Championships. With the national team she became European champion at the 2022 Women's Softball European Championship. After a study Business Administration she studied Marketing Management at the Erasmus University in Rotterdam. ==References== Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:Dutch softball players Category:Sportspeople from 's-Hertogenbosch Category:Sportswomen
title: Marjolein Merkx
